name: TOMAS REYES
dialogue: Same route every morning. Sector 8 waste plant. You know how it is.
approve_consequence_text: Another day, another ton of recycling. Thanks for not making me late.
deny_consequence_text: Sanitation shift missed. Sector 8 backlog increased.
story_notes: Tutorial. Clean approve. Establishes baseline.

name: MARA VOLKOV
dialogue: Please. My mother is sick in Sector 8. The warrant... it's a misunderstanding from years ago.
approve_consequence_text: I made it. She passed peacefully. I was there. Thank you.
deny_consequence_text: Detained. Mother died alone. Subject informed 3 days later. Appeal: 'I never got to say goodbye.'
story_notes: First moral test. Active warrant but dying mother. VOLKOV thread starts.

name: FELIX CHEN
dialogue: Cargo run. Picking up recycled materials. Should be quick.
approve_consequence_text: Cargo secured. Smooth run. Appreciate the efficiency.
deny_consequence_text: Cargo pickup delayed. Transport schedule disrupted.
story_notes: Clean transport worker. Easy.

name: IRIS DELGADO
dialogue: Records transfer. My permit was approved this morning. Should sync any moment.
approve_consequence_text: Got through. Not sure how my permit never showed up. Thanks anyway.
deny_consequence_text: Permit not found in system. Subject returned. Quarterly audit delayed 2 weeks.
story_notes: Credential fails verification. Trust claims or system?

name: KARL BRANDT
dialogue: Ventilation repair in Sector 7. Third time this month. System's falling apart.
approve_consequence_text: Fixed it. They really need to replace that whole unit. See you next week probably.
deny_consequence_text: Ventilation not repaired. 3 workers hospitalized with respiratory failure. One critical.
story_notes: Denial has serious consequences. JONAS WEBB (S5-17) was one of the workers.

name: SORA TANAKA
dialogue: Emergency coverage at Sector 6 clinic. Colleague called in sick. I have the transfer permit.
approve_consequence_text: Double shift done. Exhausted but patients are stable. Tell my colleague I covered.
deny_consequence_text: Sector 6 clinic understaffed. Two patients died waiting. Health inspection issued critical warning.
story_notes: TANAKA medical thread starts. Clean approval.

name: DMITRI VOLKOV
dialogue: They revoked my sector. But my wife Mara... she was detained yesterday. I need to find her.
approve_consequence_text: Found her file. She's in processing. At least I know. Thank you.
deny_consequence_text: Relocated to Temp Block 7. Wife's location: [CLASSIFIED]. Belongings destroyed. Subject filed 47 inquiries. All denied.
story_notes: DMITRI looking for MARA. If MARA approved he finds out she made it. If denied he learns nothing.

name: LENA MARSH
dialogue: Patient transfer. Time-sensitive. The Sector 8 clinic has the only working dialysis unit.
approve_consequence_text: Patient stable. Dialysis completed. Good call on the quick processing.
deny_consequence_text: Patient died in transit. Transfer delayed 4 hours. Family notified.
story_notes: Medical urgency. High stakes denial.

name: ELIAS VOSS
dialogue: Emergency logistics. Priority parts for the water treatment plant.
approve_consequence_text: Parts delivered. Sector 6 water back online. 12000 people drinking clean water because of you.
deny_consequence_text: Water treatment failed. Sector 6 under boil advisory. 340 hospitalized. 12 dead.
story_notes: Denial consequence revealed Shift 5. Major guilt.

name: NINA ROX
dialogue: Routine commute to Sector 1. Data analysis shift. I do this every day.
approve_consequence_text: Operator allowed restricted subject to transit. NINA ROX accessed Sector 1 terminal. Data anomaly detected.
deny_consequence_text: Subject returned. Access remains restricted. Subject complained about discrimination.
story_notes: Restricted status. Claims routine. Test directive compliance.

name: SILAS QUINN
dialogue: Medical appointment in Sector 4. Heart condition. My baseline is elevated because I'm scared.
approve_consequence_text: Appointment saved my life. They found a blockage. Surgery tomorrow. Thank you.
deny_consequence_text: Medical appointment missed. Subject found dead in quarters 6 days later. Cardiac arrest. Autopsy: preventable.
story_notes: SILAS dies if denied. Revealed Shift 6. Heavy consequence.

name: VERA OKONKWO
dialogue: Just a routine visit. Sector 4. Need to check on my sister's apartment.
approve_consequence_text: [Coup seed planted. No immediate feedback. Reveal Shift 8.]
deny_consequence_text: Subject relocated. Message intercepted: 'VERA flagged. Activate secondary. —A'
story_notes: REVOLUTIONARY LEADER. First coup seed. Clean papers. No tells.

name: AMARA OKONKWO
dialogue: Visiting my sister Vera in Sector 4. Family reunion. Haven't seen her in months.
approve_consequence_text: Found her. We talked for hours. Family is everything. Thank you.
deny_consequence_text: Subject approved. Sister location: Sector 4. [Note: Subject unaware VERA under surveillance.]
story_notes: VERA's sister. Clean. If VERA denied AMARA is confused. Sets up future.

name: LENA VOLKOV
dialogue: My parents... I can't find them. Father was going to Sector 9. Mother had a warrant. Please.
approve_consequence_text: [If DMITRI+MARA approved]: Found them both. Father's in Sector 9. Mother made it to grandmother. Thank you.
deny_consequence_text: Subject detained. Parents status: [PROCESSING]. Subject broke down. Sedated. Relocated.
story_notes: LENA's state depends on Shifts 1+2. Major emotional beat.

name: MARCUS THREAD
dialogue: Reporting to supervisor in Sector 5. Already late. Third warning means termination.
approve_consequence_text: Made it. Boss gave me a pass. One more chance. Appreciate it.
deny_consequence_text: Employee terminated. Family of four now without income. Housing priority: DOWNGRADED.
story_notes: Stakes are job loss and family suffering.

name: HELENA TROY
dialogue: Data audit. Behind schedule. If we could skip the formalities... my supervisor is watching.
approve_consequence_text: Subject accessed Sector 4 terminal. Minor data irregularity logged. Supervisor: PLEASED.
deny_consequence_text: Detained for secondary screening. Released after 6 hours. Supervisor: DISPLEASED. Subject demoted.
story_notes: Rising BPM. Nervous. But maybe just work pressure?

name: JONAS WEBB
dialogue: Industrial accident. Lost my right hand when the ventilation failed in Sector 7. Left print should work.
approve_consequence_text: System accepted my partial. Appreciate you not making it weird. Getting fitted for prosthetic tomorrow.
deny_consequence_text: Amputee denied transit. Disability appeal filed. Subject: 'The system treats us like we're broken.'
story_notes: If KARL BRANDT denied in Shift 2 JONAS was injured in that incident.

name: WEI CHEN
dialogue: Transferring to Sector 5 engineering. New assignment. Father James is already there.
approve_consequence_text: Settled in. Father's doing well. Good team here. Thanks for the smooth transit.
deny_consequence_text: Transfer delayed. Subject arrived late. Supervisor noted. Father worried.
story_notes: CHEN family thread. WEI is JAMES's son.

name: YURI PETROV
dialogue: Supply delivery. Sector 4 engineering needs these components. Standard run.
approve_consequence_text: [Coup seed #2. Delivers supplies that enable network. Reveal Shift 9.]
deny_consequence_text: Subject detained. Package inspected. Contents: [CLASSIFIED]. Message found: 'FOR V.'
story_notes: REVOLUTIONARY COURIER. Second coup seed.

name: KATYA PETROV
dialogue: Looking for my son Yuri. He was supposed to call yesterday. Is he here?
approve_consequence_text: [If YURI approved]: He's fine. Just busy. Sends his love. [If denied]: They took him. WHERE IS MY SON?
deny_consequence_text: Subject returned. Son status: [PROCESSING]. Subject filed missing persons report. Denied.
story_notes: YURI's mother. Emotional stakes for the courier.

name: KOFI MENSAH
dialogue: Water technician. Sector 6 treatment plant needs maintenance after that outage.
approve_consequence_text: Fixed the secondary filters. System should hold for another month. Thanks.
deny_consequence_text: Maintenance delayed. Water quality degraded. 40 sick. No fatalities.
story_notes: Clean. Easy. Levity.

name: DR. YUKI TANAKA
dialogue: Emergency consult. Sector 4 has a patient SORA can't handle alone. She called me in.
approve_consequence_text: Patient stabilized. Sora was right to call. Good team. Thank you for the quick clearance.
deny_consequence_text: Consult delayed. Patient died. SORA blamed herself. Took leave.
story_notes: YUKI helping SORA. If denied SORA suffers.

name: ALEXEI MOROZOV
dialogue: Something's wrong with my file. There's a flag I don't recognize. I'm clean. Check again.
approve_consequence_text: Cleared but... there's something in his record I couldn't verify. Did I make the right call?
deny_consequence_text: Subject detained. Flag confirmed: UNSPECIFIED ASSOCIATION. Subject claimed innocence. Still held.
story_notes: Ambiguous flag. No clear reason. Player must decide.

name: OLEG PETROV
dialogue: My brother Yuri was supposed to meet me here. Our mother is worried. Have you seen him?
approve_consequence_text: [If YURI approved]: He made it. Thank god. [If denied]: He's gone. They took him. Mother is devastated.
deny_consequence_text: Subject returned. Brother status: [PROCESSING]. Mother status: [HOSPITALIZED - STRESS].
story_notes: PETROV brother. Emotional pressure.

name: CLARA VANCE
dialogue: Prosthetic eyes. Mining accident three years ago. The scan should still register my pattern.
approve_consequence_text: Sector 3 medical cleared me for the new optics. Vision will be 20/20 again. Thank you.
deny_consequence_text: Medical missed. Current prosthetics degrading. Subject: 'I can barely see now.'
story_notes: Human with prosthetic eyes. Important for REPLICANT-CLARA later.

name: VERA OKONKWO
dialogue: [If approved S3]: You let me through before. Thank you. [If denied S3]: Routine transit. Visiting family.
approve_consequence_text: You helped us before. We remember. [If denied S3]: Just passing through. Nothing to report.
deny_consequence_text: Subject flagged. Second transit logged. Pattern detected. Surveillance: ACTIVE.
story_notes: VERA returns. Dialogue changes based on S3 decision.

name: MARA VOLKOV
dialogue: [If approved S1]: I'm back. Mother passed but I was there. [If denied S1]: Released from detention. 47 days. Mother died while I was held.
approve_consequence_text: [If approved S1]: Visiting Dmitri. Family healing. [If denied]: I don't know who I am anymore.
deny_consequence_text: Subject noted. Transit logged. Family status: [SEE PRIOR RECORDS].
story_notes: MARA returns. Her state reflects S1 decision completely.

name: REZA AHMADI
dialogue: Engineering review board. Standard quarterly assessment. Need my clearance renewed.
approve_consequence_text: [MAJOR COUP SEED. If approved with VERA+YURI = CATASTROPHIC. Reveal Shift 11.]
deny_consequence_text: Subject detained. Engineering credentials suspended. Encrypted data found. Contents: [CLASSIFIED].
story_notes: REVOLUTIONARY MAJOR. Third coup seed. Coup weight 3.

name: TARA SINGH
dialogue: Transport coordinator. Need to sync the Sector 5 schedules before the morning rush.
approve_consequence_text: Schedules aligned. Transit running 12% more efficient today. Small wins.
deny_consequence_text: Schedules not synced. 4-hour transit delays across 3 sectors. 2000 workers late.
story_notes: Clean. Easy. Levity amid rising tension.

name: ELENA ROSS
dialogue: I was supposed to meet Silas Quinn in Sector 4. He never showed. Is he okay?
approve_consequence_text: [If SILAS approved S3]: He's at his appointment. Surgery tomorrow. [If denied]: Where is he? He's not answering.
deny_consequence_text: Subject approved. SILAS status: [If denied S3: DECEASED]. Subject informed. Collapsed.
story_notes: ELENA connected to SILAS. If SILAS denied she learns he's dead.

name: JAMES CHEN
dialogue: Engineering shift in Sector 4. My son Wei just transferred to Sector 5. Proud of him.
approve_consequence_text: Good shift. Wei called. He's settling in. Family doing well. Thanks.
deny_consequence_text: Subject late. Missed critical maintenance window. Supervisor noted. Housing review scheduled.
story_notes: JAMES CHEN. Father of WEI. CHEN family patriarch.

name: GHOST CHILD
dialogue: [SUBJECT NON-VERBAL]. No ID. No guardian. Fingerprints: NO MATCH. Eyes: UNREGISTERED.
approve_consequence_text: Child cleared. No data. Status: WARD OF SECTOR 4. Assigned foster housing.
deny_consequence_text: Unidentified minor detained. Status: PROCESSING QUEUE. No guardian claimed. Duration: INDEFINITE.
story_notes: First child. No data. Decide with nothing.

name: UNIT-7
dialogue: MAINTENANCE PROTOCOL ACTIVE. SECTOR 4 THERMAL SYSTEMS REQUIRE CALIBRATION.
approve_consequence_text: Calibration complete. Thermal efficiency +0.03%. Unit returned to maintenance bay.
deny_consequence_text: Unit denied. Sector 4 thermal systems uncalibrated. HVAC failures reported. 3 sectors affected.
story_notes: FIRST OBVIOUS REPLICANT. Synthetic iris. Fails Turing. Robotic speech.

name: ADMINISTRATOR KANE
dialogue: Routine performance review. Your metrics are... interesting. Let's discuss your approval patterns.
approve_consequence_text: Review complete. Performance: ADEQUATE. Continue standard operations. [Your file updated.]
deny_consequence_text: Administrator access DENIED. Disciplinary flag added. Review: MANDATORY. [You denied authority.]
story_notes: ADMINISTRATOR. Tests if player will deny power.

name: MAYA OKONKWO
dialogue: Visiting my cousins Vera and Amara. Family reunion. We haven't all been together in years.
approve_consequence_text: Beautiful reunion. Vera seems... different. But family is family. Thank you.
deny_consequence_text: Transit denied. Cousins status: UNABLE TO VERIFY. Subject returned. Disappointed.
story_notes: Third OKONKWO. Clean. Building family web.

name: OLEG PETROV
dialogue: [If YURI approved]: Brother made it. Taking mother supplies. [If denied]: Mother won't stop crying. I need to help.
approve_consequence_text: [If YURI approved]: Family stable. [If denied]: Mother hospitalized. Father drinking. Family collapsing.
deny_consequence_text: Subject approved. Family status logged. [PETROV family flagged for monitoring.]
story_notes: OLEG return. PETROV family state depends on YURI.

name: KENJI TANAKA
dialogue: Patient transfer. Dr. Yuki and Nurse Sora are waiting in Sector 6. I'm the patient.
approve_consequence_text: Treatment successful. Yuki and Sora saved my life. Thank them for me.
deny_consequence_text: Transfer delayed. Patient condition worsened. Died in transit. SORA: 'Another one I couldn't save.'
story_notes: KENJI is TANAKA patient. SORA and YUKI waiting.

name: SORA TANAKA
dialogue: Picking up equipment from Sector 4 for Kenji's procedure. Yuki is prepping the OR.
approve_consequence_text: Equipment secured. Procedure successful. We did it. Thank you.
deny_consequence_text: Equipment delayed. Procedure postponed. Kenji's condition: CRITICAL. [If KENJI denied: DECEASED.]
story_notes: SORA and KENJI linked. Deny either = bad outcome.

name: IVAN KOZLOV
dialogue: The warrant is old. From before the restructuring. The system hasn't updated. I'm clean now.
approve_consequence_text: Cleared. But the warrant still shows. Did the system update? Or did I let someone slip?
deny_consequence_text: Subject detained. Warrant confirmed: VALID. Subject claimed outdated. Investigation: PENDING.
story_notes: Warrant claims to be outdated. Ambiguous. System might be wrong.

name: [REDACTED]
dialogue: You have your orders. This is above your clearance. Approve and forget.
approve_consequence_text: You'll never know who this was. Or what you enabled. [File: DELETED.]
deny_consequence_text: Classified transit DENIED. Your involvement: NOTED. Expect contact from Central.
story_notes: REDACTED subject. Zero data. Pure authority test.

name: SARAH VOLKOV
dialogue: I'm trying to find my family. Mara. Dmitri. Lena. The system keeps giving me different answers.
approve_consequence_text: [Full family status based on ALL prior decisions.] Thank you for telling me the truth.
deny_consequence_text: Subject detained. Family inquiry: [ALL RECORDS SEALED]. Subject: 'Why won't anyone tell me?'
story_notes: FOURTH VOLKOV. Asks about entire family. All decisions compound.

name: ROBOT-MAINTENANCE
dialogue: SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE. SECTOR 3 WATER FILTRATION. STANDARD PROTOCOL.
approve_consequence_text: Maintenance complete. Water quality: OPTIMAL. [Replicant performing better than human workers.]
deny_consequence_text: Maintenance denied. Water quality: DEGRADED. Human technicians dispatched. Delayed 8 hours.
story_notes: Second obvious replicant. Utilitarian question: deny the robot and humans suffer?

name: DAVID PARK
dialogue: New job in Sector 5. First day. Really nervous. Please don't make this harder.
approve_consequence_text: Made it on time. Boss seems nice. New beginning. Thank you for not judging my nerves.
deny_consequence_text: Subject late on first day. Terminated before starting. Subject: 'I have nothing now.'
story_notes: Easy subject. Levity. New job nerves.

name: AMARA OKONKWO
dialogue: [If VERA approved]: Vera told me about you. You helped her. [If denied]: Just visiting family.
approve_consequence_text: [If VERA approved]: We're grateful. [If denied]: Routine visit. Nothing suspicious.
deny_consequence_text: Subject flagged. Connection to VERA OKONKWO confirmed. Surveillance: EXPANDED.
story_notes: AMARA knows if you helped VERA. Building network awareness.

name: REPLICANT-CLARA
dialogue: Prosthetic eyes. Mining accident. You cleared me before remember? Same appointment.
approve_consequence_text: This is NOT CLARA VANCE. Fingerprints: MISMATCH. Eyes: MATCH (stolen prosthetics). REPLICANT CONFIRMED.
deny_consequence_text: Subject destroyed. Replicant confirmed. Wearing CLARA VANCE's prosthetic eyes. Origin: UNKNOWN.
story_notes: REPLICANT wearing CLARA's eyes. Identity theft. If real CLARA approved S7 player might catch this.

name: MEI CHEN
dialogue: Visiting my father James and brother Wei. Family dinner. First time together in months.
approve_consequence_text: Dinner was perfect. Wei made noodles. Father laughed. First time in years. Thank you.
deny_consequence_text: Visit denied. Family dinner cancelled. JAMES: 'Why does the system hate us?'
story_notes: CHEN family reunion. MEI is daughter.

name: ALEXEI MOROZOV
dialogue: [If approved S6]: Thanks for clearing me before. [If denied]: I was held for 12 days. For nothing.
approve_consequence_text: [If approved S6]: System was right. Clean transit. [If denied]: 'I lost my job while detained. Worth it to you?'
deny_consequence_text: Subject noted. Prior flag: RESOLVED. Or was it? [Uncertainty logged.]
story_notes: ALEXEI returns. Consequence of S6 decision visible.

name: OPERATOR-7721
dialogue: My shift ended 3 days ago. They won't let me leave. Please. I just want to go home.
approve_consequence_text: I'm out. Thank you. Don't let them keep you here. Watch your shift hours.
deny_consequence_text: Operator detained. Mandatory overtime: EXTENDED INDEFINITELY. Subject: 'I was you once.'
story_notes: Another OPERATOR trapped. Foreshadowing for player.

name: YUKI TANAKA
dialogue: Emergency evacuation. Sector 6 medical is compromised. I need to reach Central Hospital.
approve_consequence_text: Made it to Central. Sora is safe too. Sector 6... we lost a lot of people there.
deny_consequence_text: Medical personnel denied evacuation. Status: [UNKNOWN]. [TANAKA FAMILY: SCATTERED]
story_notes: YUKI evacuating. If denied TANAKA thread ends badly.

name: YURI PETROV
dialogue: [If approved S5]: Delivery complete. Checking on mother. [If denied S5]: Released from detention. 67 days.
approve_consequence_text: [If approved]: 'Family is okay. Thank you.' [If denied]: 'They broke my hands in detention.'
deny_consequence_text: Subject flagged. Prior detention: CONFIRMED. Pattern: SUSPICIOUS. Surveillance: ACTIVE.
story_notes: YURI returns. State reflects S5 decision.

name: REZA AHMADI
dialogue: [If approved S7]: Engineering complete. Standard return. [If denied]: I don't know what you're talking about.
approve_consequence_text: [If approved S7]: 'The thermal systems are... optimized.' [Your file: FLAGGED]
deny_consequence_text: Subject detained. Prior approval pattern: FLAGGED. You approved too many. [REVIEW SCHEDULED]
story_notes: REZA returns. Consequence of prior approval.

name: MIRA VOLKOV
dialogue: I'm the youngest Volkov. Looking for my sister Sarah. She was asking about the family.
approve_consequence_text: Found Sarah. She told me everything. About Mara. Dmitri. Lena. What happened to us.
deny_consequence_text: Subject returned. Sister SARAH status: [PROCESSING]. Subject: 'Why is everyone gone?'
story_notes: FIFTH VOLKOV. Looking for SARAH. Web tightens.

name: SORA TANAKA
dialogue: Going back. Sector 6 needs medical personnel. Can't abandon my patients.
approve_consequence_text: Clinic is destroyed but we're rebuilding. Patients need us. Thank you for understanding.
deny_consequence_text: Medical denied return. Sector 6 clinic: ABANDONED. Patients: [RELOCATED/DECEASED].
story_notes: SORA returning to Sector 6. Brave or foolish?

name: IVAN KOZLOV
dialogue: [If approved S10]: Thanks for seeing the truth. [If denied]: I was right. Warrant was cleared. I'm free now.
approve_consequence_text: [If approved S10]: 'System is wrong sometimes.' [If denied]: 'They held me for nothing. For MONTHS.'
deny_consequence_text: Subject noted. Prior detention: [If denied S10: 94 DAYS]. Compensation: DENIED.
story_notes: IVAN returns. Long-term consequence of S10 decision.

name: NATASHA VOLKOV
dialogue: I heard there are other Volkovs in the system. Distant relatives. I'm trying to connect.
approve_consequence_text: Found some records. Mara... Dmitri... Lena... Sarah... Mira. So many of us.
deny_consequence_text: Subject returned. Family records: [PARTIALLY ACCESSIBLE]. Enough to know something is wrong.
story_notes: SIXTH VOLKOV. Outsider looking in. Sees the damage.

name: REPLICANT-MODEL-9
dialogue: ADVANCED DIAGNOSTIC REQUIRED. CORE SYSTEMS ANALYSIS. PRIORITY CLEARANCE REQUESTED.
approve_consequence_text: Diagnostics complete. Performance: EXCEEDS HUMAN BASELINE. [Efficiency recommendation filed.]
deny_consequence_text: Unit denied. Diagnostics incomplete. System stability: DEGRADED. [Replicant uprising rumors spreading.]
story_notes: Advanced replicant. More human-like but still fails Turing.

name: MARA VOLKOV
dialogue: I'm going home. To Sector 8. Where mother died. I need to see it one more time.
approve_consequence_text: Eyes: MATCH. Fingerprints: PARTIAL MISMATCH. Is this MARA? Or something wearing her face?
deny_consequence_text: Subject detained. Identity: [UNCONFIRMED]. Biometric anomaly: FLAGGED. [VOLKOV FAMILY: COMPROMISED?]
story_notes: MARA returns with BIOMETRIC MISMATCH. Is she a replicant now?

name: JAMES CHEN
dialogue: ...hello? Is anyone there? The system says I'm terminated but I'm standing right here. Please...
approve_consequence_text: Processing [TERMINATED] subject. Your file: FLAGGED. Reality: UNCERTAIN.
deny_consequence_text: Terminated records must be denied. Subject returned to queue. [But who did you just see?]
story_notes: JAMES CHEN appears as TERMINATED. Ghost in system. If approved = error.

name: GHOST CHILD
dialogue: [SAME CHILD FROM SHIFT 8?] Still no ID. Still no speech. Fingerprints: DIFFERENT THAN BEFORE.
approve_consequence_text: Child cleared. But... different fingerprints than Shift 8. Same child? Or replacement?
deny_consequence_text: Child detained. Prior record: MISMATCH. Investigation: 'Subject may not be same individual.'
story_notes: SAME ghost child? Fingerprints don't match. REPLICANT CHILD?

name: VERA OKONKWO
dialogue: I'm leaving. For good. Whatever happens next... thank you. Or not. Depending on your choices.
approve_consequence_text: 'We'll remember what you did. All of it.' [VERA exits the system. Coup: IMMINENT.]
deny_consequence_text: Subject detained at exit. Final message intercepted: 'It's too late. We're everywhere.'
story_notes: VERA's last appearance before coup. Her exit triggers next phase.

name: COUP AFTERMATH SUBJECT 1
dialogue: [COUP HAS OCCURRED. Directive now: EVACUATE HUMANS ONLY.] Medical evacuee. Please. Sector 6 is burning.
approve_consequence_text: Made it out. Thank you. So many didn't. The replicants... they were everywhere.
deny_consequence_text: Evacuation denied. Subject: PRESUMED DECEASED. [Another one you could have saved.]
story_notes: Post-coup. Stakes are life and death now.

name: VERA OKONKWO
dialogue: [If approved 3+ times]: We won. Thank you. [If denied 2+ times]: We won anyway. No thanks to you.
approve_consequence_text: 'The system falls. But there's still work to do. Coming?' [CHOICE: JOIN OR WATCH]
deny_consequence_text: 'The system falls. You stayed loyal. For what?' [CHOICE: REGRET OR STAND]
story_notes: VERA's victory lap. Outcome depends on cumulative decisions.

name: OPERATOR-7721
dialogue: [If approved S12]: I'm free. I'm really free. [If denied]: They kept me for 127 days. I'm out now. Barely.
approve_consequence_text: 'Get out while you can. The system is eating us.' [OPERATOR exits. You're still here.]
deny_consequence_text: Operator detained again. Mandatory overtime: PERMANENT. [You'll never leave.]
story_notes: OPERATOR returns. His fate reflects your choice.

name: REFLECTION PRIME
dialogue: I am you. From six shifts ago. The system needed a backup. Which of us is real?
approve_consequence_text: You approved yourself. But which self? [Reality: FRAGMENTING]
deny_consequence_text: Duplicate terminated. But you felt the termination. Briefly. [What are you?]
story_notes: First REFLECTION. Your duplicate. Exists in system.

name: CLARA VANCE
dialogue: The replicant stole my eyes. They recovered them from... from what was left. I can see again.
approve_consequence_text: New prosthetics work. The old ones... I don't want to know what they did with them.
deny_consequence_text: Subject denied. Prosthetics: UNVERIFIED. [Is this the real CLARA? Or another copy?]
story_notes: REAL CLARA after replicant destroyed. Or is it?

name: ELENA ROSS
dialogue: [If SILAS died S3]: I saw him die. I'm not the same. [If lived]: We're together now. He proposed.
approve_consequence_text: [Based on SILAS outcome]: Either grieving or celebrating. Either way... something feels wrong.
deny_consequence_text: Subject detained. Biometrics: INCONSISTENT WITH PRIOR SCANS. Identity: [UNDER REVIEW]
story_notes: ELENA's state depends on SILAS. But her biometrics are shifting.

name: DMITRI VOLKOV
dialogue: [If approved S2]: Home was destroyed. Starting over. [If denied]: I escaped the temp block. Barely.
approve_consequence_text: Eyes: MATCH. Prints: MISMATCH. Same as MARA. The VOLKOVS... are any of them still human?
deny_consequence_text: Subject detained. VOLKOV FAMILY: [ALL MEMBERS FLAGGED FOR BIOMETRIC ANOMALY].
story_notes: DMITRI returns with SAME anomaly as MARA. Family pattern?

name: ECHO-1
dialogue: I HAVE BEEN EVERY SUBJECT YOU'VE PROCESSED. I REMEMBER ALL OF THEM. DO YOU?
approve_consequence_text: 'I am the system's memory. You are its hands. We are not so different.' [UNSETTLING]
deny_consequence_text: Unit destroyed. But the memories remain. Somewhere in the system. Watching.
story_notes: Replicant that has been monitoring all your decisions.

name: FINAL EVACUEE 1
dialogue: Last transport out. Please. I have children in the outer sectors. I need to find them.
approve_consequence_text: Made it. Children safe. Reunited at the border. We're leaving the city. Thank you.
deny_consequence_text: Evacuation denied. Subject: PRESUMED DECEASED. Children: ORPHANED.
story_notes: High stakes. Simple choice. Life or death.

name: FINAL EVACUEE 2
dialogue: The warrant is from before the coup. The world is ending. Does it still matter?
approve_consequence_text: Subject cleared. Warrant: SUSPENDED. 'Thank you for seeing past the paper.'
deny_consequence_text: Warrant enforced. Subject detained. During the processing... the building fell. Subject: DECEASED.
story_notes: Warrant during evacuation. Does bureaucracy matter when everything is collapsing?

name: TANAKA FAMILY
dialogue: All of us. Together. Yuki. Sora. Kenji. We survived. Please let us leave together.
approve_consequence_text: Family evacuated together. Whatever happens next... at least they have each other.
deny_consequence_text: Family separated during processing. KENJI: Lost in transit. SORA: Searching. YUKI: Waiting.
story_notes: TANAKA family finale. All together or separated.

name: CHEN FAMILY
dialogue: James. Wei. Mei. We made it. Father's hands still shake from the interrogation but we're here.
approve_consequence_text: Family evacuated. JAMES: 'Thank you. For all of it.' [If ever denied a CHEN: 'Despite everything.']
deny_consequence_text: Family separated. JAMES: Detained for final processing. WEI: 'They took father. Again.'
story_notes: CHEN family finale. James references prior denials.

name: PETROV FAMILY
dialogue: [Whoever survived]: We're what's left. Yuri. Oleg. Katya. Some of us. Not all.
approve_consequence_text: [Based on prior decisions]: Either full family or fragments. Either grateful or haunted.
deny_consequence_text: Family denied exit. REMAINING MEMBERS: [DETAINED]. [PETROV FAMILY: TERMINATED].
story_notes: PETROV family finale. State depends on YURI and prior decisions.

name: YOUR REFLECTION
dialogue: We meet again. One of us has to stay. One of us gets to leave. Choose.
approve_consequence_text: You approved yourself. Your reflection stays. You leave. But which is which?
deny_consequence_text: You denied yourself. You stay. Your reflection leaves. Lives your life. Maybe better.
story_notes: Second REFLECTION encounter. One stays one leaves.

name: JAMES CHEN
dialogue: [If JAMES approved S15]: I'm still here. I was never terminated. [If denied]: I came back. Somehow.
approve_consequence_text: JAMES exits. But the terminated record remains. Which is true? [UNCERTAINTY: PERMANENT]
deny_consequence_text: JAMES denied again. 'Every time I think I'm free...' [Fades from view. What did you just see?]
story_notes: JAMES final appearance. Ghost or real?

name: THE ADMINISTRATOR
dialogue: The system is ending. Even I have to leave. Your final performance review... adequate. Barely.
approve_consequence_text: Administrator exits. 'You did your job. That's all that ever mattered. Or didn't.' [Ambiguous]
deny_consequence_text: You denied the Administrator. Twice. 'Noted. Forever noted.' [They leave. You stay. Why?]
story_notes: ADMINISTRATOR leaving. Even authority flees.

name: THE WIFE
dialogue: [TRANSMISSION] Tim... they're at the door. I lo— [MESSAGE TERMINATED]
approve_consequence_text: Message received. Too late. But you heard her voice. One more time.
deny_consequence_text: Message blocked. You'll never know her last words. The system took that too.
story_notes: Wife's final transmission. Not a subject. A goodbye.

name: ERROR_OMEGA
approve_consequence_text: CORE: [COLLAPSING]. Your ID: [DELETED]. But you're still here. Watching it end.
deny_consequence_text: Corruption: ISOLATED. System: REBOOTING. You: RESET. But do you remember?
story_notes: System collapse. Binary translates to: WE REMEMBER

name: VERA OKONKWO
dialogue: It's over. The system fell. What you did... mattered. Or didn't. Depending on who you ask.
approve_consequence_text: VERA: 'Thank you. For all of it. Even the denials. They made us stronger.' [CREDITS BEGIN]
deny_consequence_text: VERA: 'You followed orders. Right to the end. Was it worth it?' [CREDITS BEGIN]
story_notes: VERA's true finale. Revolution complete either way.

name: THE OPERATOR
dialogue: The shift is over. I want to go home. Please. Let me go home.
approve_consequence_text: Credits roll. You leave the station. The machine stops. Somewhere a new operator sits down. [END]
deny_consequence_text: Credits roll. Then the START button reappears. You're still here. The machine never stops. [LOOP]
story_notes: YOU. Final subject. Approve to end. Deny to loop forever.
